articles.title: SingleStore Expands Presence to Serve Japan and Accelerate Global Enterprise AI Innovation
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: SingleStore launched its database product in Japan to meet the increasing demand for AI-optimized data infrastructure. This expansion strengthens SingleStore's position in providing real-time capabilities for developing high-performing enterprise AI applications.

articles.title: These one-offs show that the Toyota Lite Ace is a great blank canvas
articles.summary: Daihatsu showcased two concept versions of the Gran Max van at the Gaikindo Indonesia International Auto Show: the City Pop concept, inspired by 80s Japanese pop music, and the Taft Guy concept, inspired by old-school 4x4s. The City Pop concept features a reshaped hood, black grille with round headlights, and a throwback color scheme, while the Taft Guy concept gets a reshaped front end, different front bumper, and dark green color.

articles.title: 43 Items To Transform Your Home Into A Personal Haven
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The list introduces a variety of products designed to enhance comfort and relaxation at home.  These range from wearable blankets and cozy bedding to aroma diffusers, smart mugs, and even indoor herb gardens. The products aim to create a comfortable and relaxing personal space.

articles.title: Will AI help or wreck your vacation with its advice?
articles.summary: ChatGPT, DeepSeek and Manus are AI platforms used to create travel itineraries. However, they provide recommendations based on data scraped from the internet, tourist spots and could be out of date. The AI tools break down language and cultural barriers for travelers.

articles.title: 25 Products With Super Satisfying Results
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: This article features a variety of newly available cleaning and cosmetic products. These include Dawn Powerwash dish spray for cutting grease, The Pink Stuff cleaner for household items, and Bio-Oil for reducing scars. Other highlighted products are a butt acne-clearing lotion and a vitamin C serum, among others that solve everyday problems in cleaning and skincare.

articles.title: Yes, That's A Spam Musubi Truck Rolling Down The Streets In SoCal
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Musubi Mobile is offering free samples at a specific location.

articles.title: Adtelligent Launches Retail Media Platform for Full-Funnel, Cross-Channel Retail Advertising
articles.author: Adtelligent Inc.
articles.summary: Adtelligent has launched its Retail Media Platform, a solution designed to help retailers monetize their digital properties. The platform offers retailers control over ad inventory and shopper experience across on-site, off-site, and in-store channels with features like omnichannel ad delivery, customizable ad placements and real-time reporting.

articles.title: DRAFT Christian McCaffrey, De'Von Achane over Ashon Jeanty? Fantasy RB rankings, 1-15 for 2025
articles.summary: KAGS requires users to download the KAGS app to stream content on their phones, implying a service offered through the app.

articles.title: We tried Grok Imagine for AI video and images: Here's our initial thoughts
articles.author: Timothy Beck Werth
articles.summary: xAI has released Grok Imagine, a new tool within the Grok iOS and Android apps, allowing users to generate AI images and short video clips. This feature is available to Heavy and Premium+ subscribers on iOS and Heavy users on Android.

articles.title: TruSkin serum works harder than your ex ever did — oh and it's 56% off
articles.author: Charlotte Finch
articles.summary: TruSkin's Vitamin C Serum, available on Amazon, is being promoted for its effective blend of Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamin E, targeting dark spots and fine lines. The serum is cruelty-free, vegan, and unscented, offering a low-maintenance skincare solution for a brighter complexion.

articles.title: Prompt Buddy Launches as the Ultimate AI Video Prompt Generator for Creators and Brands
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Prompt Buddy, an AI video prompt generator, has launched on the Chrome Store. The product transforms vague ideas into polished video prompts, aiming to simplify AI video creation.

articles.title: Korean YouTuber Tests Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Resilience With 200,000 Direct Folds
articles.summary: A South Korean YouTuber tested the durability of the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 by manually folding and opening it 200,000 times.  Samsung claims the Galaxy Z Fold 7 can withstand 500,000 folds under ideal conditions and is equipped with features like Ultra Thin Glass, elastic adhesive, and titanium plates to enhance endurance.

articles.title: 22nd Century Announces First Shipments of Pinnacle VLN® Products to Top 5 C-Store Chain Locations Across 12 States  Aug. 4, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: 22nd Century Group is launching its new Pinnacle VLN® Gold and Pinnacle VLN® Menthol reduced nicotine content cigarettes. The launch is expected on September 1, 2025, at almost 1,000 locations across 12 states for a top-5 U.S. convenience store chain.

articles.title: New Spider-Man Suit For Brand New Day Goes Viral After Surprise Reveal
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Marvel and Sony presented a first look at Spider-Man's new suit. This reveal comes a year before the release of Spider-Man: Brand New Day.

articles.title: These "Porsche" Backpacks are An AI-Generated Oddity
articles.author: Chris Teague
articles.summary: AliExpress sellers are offering Porsche 911-inspired backpacks, utilizing AI-generated images for advertisement. These backpacks, priced around $200 plus shipping, feature designs mimicking the rear of a Porsche, including options with spoilers and dual exhaust systems, although they are likely not official Porsche products.

articles.title: Asian Food Market Applies To Open at Former Sam Ash in Edison
articles.summary: Asian Fresh of Edison, Inc. has applied to open a new Asian retail food market at 1837 Route 27 in Edison, NJ. The market will sell produce, fruits, and Asian-style groceries, employing 10 people per shift and operating daily from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM. The market is planned to be approximately 14,478 square feet.

articles.title: This is Your Browser On AI. Any Questions?
articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.summary: Microsoft launched Copilot Mode for Edge, an AI-powered browser offering unified chat, search, and navigation. Other companies like Perplexity with Comet, Dia, and Opera with Aria are also introducing AI-integrated browsers with different approaches to privacy, pricing, and capabilities. Opera is developing Opera Neon, which will be focused on AI agentic tasks.

articles.title: Let a robot handle your chores: Save $269 on this smart vacuum-mop combo
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: ECOVACS is offering the Deebot NEO+, a 2-in-1 vacuum and mop combo, for $229.99. This smart cleaner features 4,000Pa suction, an intelligent mopping system, LiDAR navigation, and a self-emptying dustbin, all controllable via the ECOVACS app.

articles.title: Jennifer Aniston Debuts New ‘Curve Cut' Hairstyle
articles.author: Lia Mappoura
articles.summary: Jennifer Aniston's haircare brand, LolaVie, launched a new dry shampoo. The launch coincides with Aniston showcasing a new "curve cut" hairstyle, which can be styled using LolaVie's products.

articles.title: New to The Street Launches 1,000+ Commercial TV Blitz for Synergy CHC ($SNYR), Makers of Focus Factor(R) - Adds NewsOut Video PR Coverage & NYC #1 Market Saturation
articles.summary: New to The Street launched a television commercial campaign for Synergy CHC Corp's Focus Factor, featuring over 1,000 commercials across national networks and local stations. The campaign includes NewsOut Video Press Release Coverage and distribution across New to The Street's YouTube channel, aiming to provide extensive visibility for Synergy CHC and its brain health supplement.

articles.title: Motorola is so close to getting mobile AI right, but there's still work to do
articles.author: Brady Snyder
articles.summary: Motorola's Moto AI suite is being introduced with new features in the Motorola Razr Ultra 2025, including Next Move, Catch Me Up, and integration with Google AI, Microsoft, Meta and Perplexity. The Moto AI suite also provides features Pay Attention, Remember This, Magic Canvas and Group Shot. The Moto AI is designed to enhance user experience through AI-driven capabilities and offers flexibility in AI model usage.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 review: Slimmer, smarter and packed with AI features
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, featuring a slimmer and lighter design, enhanced AI capabilities, and improved camera system with a 200MP rear camera. The Fold7 also incorporates the S25's Now Briefing bar and is priced starting at £1799 for the 256GB model.

articles.title: Xsolla, In Collaboration With KRAFTON, Releases The "Abyss Of Dungeons" Web Shop To Fuel Direct-To-Player Growth
articles.summary: Xsolla, in collaboration with KRAFTON, launched a dedicated Web Shop for the Abyss of Dungeons game on June 11, 2025. The Web Shop offers exclusive in-game content and bundles, supporting KRAFTON's community-first strategy and direct-to-player approach by enabling purchases outside traditional app stores.

articles.title: Khairul Aming To Launch New Product On TikTok Shop This 8.8. Here's What We Know So Far
articles.author: Dale John Wong
articles.summary: Khairul Aming is launching a new product, Rendang Nyet Berapi, on TikTok Shop on August 8th, with a giveaway of a free holiday to New Zealand for the first five buyers of five packs. Other products in the Nyet Berapi series will be selling for a promotional price of RM0.01 during the livestream. TikTok Shop's 8.8 Super LIVE Sale also features new product reveals and deals from brands like Lancome Malaysia, 70Mai, Perysmith Malaysia, toned & Co, BGM POLO MALL, and YAN@YAN.

articles.title: Back to school fashion trends for less
articles.summary: KENS 5 offers its streaming service through the KENS 5 app, allowing users to watch content on their phones.

articles.title: Tom Holland reveals new Spider-Man suit for Spider-Man: Brand New Day: 'Are you ready?'
articles.author: Digital Spy
articles.summary: Tom Holland revealed a new Spidey suit for the upcoming movie 'Spider-Man: Brand New Day'. The fourth installment of the MCU franchise features Holland reprising his role as Spider-Man.

articles.title: This rare Dyson sale has steep discounts on stick vacuums, bladeless fans and more
articles.author: Rikka Altland
articles.summary: Dyson has launched its Dyson Week sale, offering discounts on various products. New additions include the Dyson Car+Boat Handheld Vacuum Cleaner and the Dyson Airwrap i.d. Straight and Wavy, which connects to a companion app. There are also discounts on models like Dyson V8 Absolute Vacuum ,Dyson V12 Detect Slim Cordless Vacuum, Dyson V15s Detect Submarine Absolute ,Dyson 360 Vis Nav Robot Vacuum ,Dyson Gen5outsize Absolute Vacuum etc.

articles.title: South African Mom's Nike Shoes Comparison Video Wins Over Online Shoppers, Mzansi Raves: "Beautiful"
articles.author: Johana Mukandila
articles.summary: A South African mother showcased her positive online shopping experience with Nike shoes, confirming that the product delivered matched the images shown on Nike's website. This has instilled confidence in the online purchase of children's footwear. The Nike shoes for kid cost R1 399.95.

articles.title: MangoBoost Sets New Benchmark with Record-Breaking DPU-Based AI Training Storage Solution in MLPerf Storage v2.0
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: MangoBoost has introduced its Mango StorageBoost™ solution, achieving record-breaking performance in MLPerf Storage v2.0. Mango StorageBoost™ delivers best-in-class results across the board and superior performance-to-cost versus NVIDIA's BlueField-3 DPU. The solution is available today and can be deployed in existing data center environments without modification to hardware or software stacks.

articles.title: PhonePes Indus Appstore, Alcatel announce strategic OEM partnership
articles.summary: Alcatel smartphones in India will now come pre-loaded with PhonePe's Indus Appstore, providing users with a localized digital experience. This partnership aims to enhance Alcatel's market presence and provide developers with increased opportunities to showcase their apps to Indian users.

articles.title: This Pressure Washer 'Effortlessly' Cleans Cars, Patios And Driveways — And It's Under $80
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a lightweight, electric power washer for sale. This product outputs 2.6 gallons per minute with a claimed 4,200 pounds of pressure per square inch and includes features like a 23-foot high-pressure hose, adjustable nozzle, and foam pot for enhanced cleaning.

articles.title: Shoppers snap up Blink outdoor camera that's 'easy to set up' and now 54% off
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of refurbished Blink Outdoor cameras, now available for £63.39. The camera features motion detection, two-way audio, and weather resistance, operating on two AA lithium batteries and integrating with Alexa. Alternatives like the Ring video doorbell and Google Nest Video Doorbell are also mentioned.

articles.title: Applying AI-Powered Synthetic Respondents In Market Research
articles.author: Alexander Pershikov
articles.summary: GetTransfer.com utilizes AI-driven synthetic respondents to efficiently test new features, pricing scenarios, and marketing strategies. This allows for rapid gathering of insights and fine-tuning of service offerings, enhancing decision-making capabilities. The use of this technology improves product development, marketing feedback, and customer segmentation for GetTransfer.com.

articles.title: Lava Blaze Dragon Review: Minimal Fuss, Maximum Utility On A Small Budget
articles.author: Shubham Verma
articles.summary: Lava has launched the Blaze Dragon, a budget-friendly smartphone priced at ₹9,999. The phone features a minimalistic design, a 120Hz refresh rate display, a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset for multitasking, and a 5000mAh battery, and ships with Android 15. Lava promises one Android OS upgrade and two years of security updates for this device.

articles.title: Simple Modern Launches Mesa Loop: Engineered to Be the Brand's Best Bottle Yet
articles.summary: A fast-growing brand has launched its new flagship bottle featuring an ergonomically designed handle and effortless cleanability. The bottle is designed for busy professionals, parents, and gift givers, particularly during the holiday season.

articles.title: 2025 Toyota Yaris Cross review
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: The MG ZS Hybrid+ features twin 12.3-inch screens across its range, providing a modern interface that surpasses the technology found in its class. This update enhances the vehicle's appeal compared to its predecessor and sets a new standard.

articles.title: How Amazon Brands Can Turn One-Time Buyers Into Lifelong Customers
articles.author: Jon Stojan
articles.summary: First North Marketing helps e-commerce brands increase customer lifetime value by utilizing sponsored display ads to cross-sell related products. They also advise implementing brand-tailored promotions that offer personalized deals, fostering customer loyalty and repeat purchases. This combination of strategies helps keep the brand visible and relevant, driving growth without constant cold acquisition.

articles.title: Hindustan Zinc to deploy 100 EVs in partnership with GreenLine Mobility
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Hindustan Zinc Limited (HZL) launched a product or service.

articles.title: AppLogic Networks Secures Commitment from Leading MSP to Unlock New Revenue Paths with Edge-Ready, AI-Driven QoE Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: AppLogic Networks' AI-powered visibility platform has been adopted by a managed service provider to improve Quality of Experience (QoE) for end customers. The platform brings advanced application classification, real-time QoE scoring, and personalized policy control to performance-critical sites. The software suite delivers deep application visibility and classification, behavioral insights, and seamless integration with traffic and policy engines.

articles.title: VAUNT Launches Spotlight
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: VAUNT has launched 'Spotlight,' a new AI-powered tool that enables real estate developers to automatically generate interactive digital tours. Spotlight is available for free and aims to digitalize presentations, integrating easily into existing workflows. VAUNT aims to have at least 30 developers using the 'Spotlight' to present their projects by the end of the year.

articles.title: The best Cyber Monday deals of 2020 you can still get
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Cyber Monday features numerous deals from retailers such as Amazon, Target, Walmart, and Best Buy on various products. Discounts include electronics, home goods, and appliances, with some retailers offering deals on specific brands and product lines. These sales provide opportunities for shoppers to save on a variety of items from multiple companies.

articles.title: Dreame still a new name in India but it is betting big on offline and superior service to make a mark
articles.summary: Dreame is expanding its presence in India with an offline strategy, partnering with Croma to open experience zones in 35 cities where customers can interact with products like robot vacuums. The company is also focusing on after-sales service improvements, including on-site installation and pick-up/drop services, to enhance customer experience.

articles.title: Spryker Unveils Self-Service Portal to Supercharge B2B Productivity
articles.summary: New self-service capabilities transform fragmented B2B customer interactions. These capabilities unlock operational efficiency and improve customer autonomy. The goal is a seamless and unified customer experience.

articles.title: Juicy Marbles unveils plant-based Salmon Filet after its plant-based Cod sells out in 1 hour
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Juicy Marbles is launching Kinda Salmon, the second product in its Juicy Marbles & Friends line. This line features co-branded plant-based products and is set to launch throughout 2025.

articles.title: Country's Ecommerce Marketplace Roars to Life with the Launch of Made in Uganda
articles.author: Kenneth Kazibwe
articles.summary: The Ugandan government has launched Made in Uganda (MIU), a national e-commerce and retail initiative designed to scale local innovation, manufacturing, and market access. MIU is a mission-driven platform that integrates an online marketplace, physical retail stores, and an end-to-end fulfillment system, aiming to connect Ugandan producers with consumers both at home and abroad.

articles.title: 10 best BB creams for an effortless glow, on-the-go
articles.author: Aminath Ifasa
articles.summary: BB creams are highlighted as summer beauty essentials, offering hydration, sun protection, and coverage in one product. They provide a lightweight alternative to foundations, beneficial for maintaining a fresh, dewy look. The article recommends several BB creams based on different skin types and concerns.

articles.title: Re: Stellar Blade PS5, PC Support Still Ongoing as New Patch Goes Live
articles.author: Push Square
articles.summary: Anya-chan requests the addition of Halloween costumes in October, indicating a potential new product line for an unspecified company.

articles.title: Tom holland's spiderman suit pays homage to Andrew Garfield, Tobey Maguire
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Sony unveiled a new Spider-Man: Brand New Day suit in a teaser. The new suit donned by Tom Holland appears to be a subtle tribute to his iconic predecessors. This design update features a darker color, a raised webbing pattern, and lacks the high-tech sheen of his earlier Stark-created suits.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, OnePlus 13 and 3 more: Top premium flagship phones to buy in August 2025
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold 7, a slimmer and more durable foldable smartphone with advanced features. OnePlus introduced the OnePlus 13, emphasizing performance and value with its powerful processor and large battery. Vivo's X Fold 5 competes with Samsung in the foldable market, offering high brightness display and fast charging, while Apple's iPhone 16 Pro features the A18 Pro chip and an excellent camera, and Samsung Galaxy S25 is a smaller flagship option with a 120Hz display and Snapdragon 8 Elite chip.

articles.title: 5 ChatGPT Prompts To Write Content That Sells While You Sleep
articles.author: Jodie Cook
articles.summary: The article introduces content prompts designed for use with ChatGPT to enhance marketing efforts and drive sales. These prompts guide users in creating compelling content from client testimonials, addressing customer objections, and simplifying complex processes to attract potential clients. Additionally, the article mentions accessing the author's best content prompts for ChatGPT.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold7 review: Samsung puts the flagship in the foldable
articles.author: Sami Khan
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Z Fold7, a foldable smartphone featuring a 7.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X main display, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, a 200MP main camera, and running Android 16 with One UI 8. The device boasts improvements in design, performance, and camera capabilities compared to previous models, and is available starting at Rs 1,74,999.

articles.title: Jollibee introduces new delivery app, plus Brent and Mika as new ambassadors
articles.author: Business Mirror
articles.summary: Jollibee launched its redesigned app on July 28, offering customers a smoother ordering experience with exclusive deals. New app users can avail of free Peach Mango Pie (minimum order P100) or a free Chickenjoy Super Meal (minimum order P600) from now until October 27, 2025.

articles.title: Sonic X Shadow Generations Review – Nintendo Switch 2
articles.author: This Gen Gaming
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2 with a variety of games. Many customers can anticipate platformers of a family-friendly nature.

articles.title: 35 Problem-Solving Products So Good At Their Jobs They Deserve An Award
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article showcases several newly launched or recently tested products across various categories like skincare (Olay Super Serum Body Wash, Good Molecules skincare), home cleaning (foaming pink drain cleaner), and personal care (Lumify eye drops). User reviews highlight their experiences with these products, often mentioning specific features and benefits like hydration, effectiveness, or ease of use. The products are available for purchase through Amazon or other retailers and many are from small businesses.

articles.title: Samsung Nepal opens pre-orders for Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7
articles.author: The Himalayan Times
articles.summary: Samsung Nepal has announced pre-orders for its new foldable smartphones, the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7, starting August 7, 2025. The Galaxy Z Fold7 features advanced AI, a larger display, and a 200MP camera, while the Galaxy Z Flip7 offers a larger FlexWindow and enhanced camera stabilization.

articles.title: Bagel Market Expands to Financial District with Fifth Location Opening on Wall Street
articles.summary: Bagel Market is launching a new location on Wall Street, marking its fifth location in Manhattan. This expansion aims to serve the Financial District's large workforce with its signature bagels and sandwiches, capitalizing on the New York breakfast and lunch market.

articles.title: The power and promise of in-app personalisation through AI
articles.author: Elaine van Wyk
articles.summary: Duolingo uses AI to personalize reminders based on learning goals and user patterns, which encourages learners to return to their lessons. Some companies using similar methods report up to 20% higher sales, doubled engagement rates and significantly improved campaign conversion.

articles.title: Hayley Williams' surprise 17-song release is a bold choose-your-own-adventure through hope and heartache
articles.author: NME
articles.summary: Good Dye Young launched a new product, a vivid marigold hair dye. This new shade is designed to capture the essence of summer nights.

articles.title: It takes a lot to impress a mature skin beauty writer – but this anti-ageing cream won me over
articles.author: Sabine Wiesel
articles.summary: Murad has launched a range of four new SPF moisturisers, including the Murad superactive moisturiser SPF50. This update to the essential-C day moisturise SPF30 features a new formula and look, promising a 3-in-1 moisturiser, skin-brightener, and sunscreen.

articles.title: Party with Swag, As Smoov Unveils its New TVC Smoov Groove
articles.author: Linda Ikeji
articles.summary: Smoov has unveiled its new TVC, 'Smoov Groove'.

articles.title: Nokia 5.4 successor to 5.3 mid-ranger appears on Australian retailer sites
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Nokia Mobile is potentially launching a new mid-range smartphone called the Nokia 5.4.

articles.title: 49 Mundane Products That Are, To Put It Lightly, Life Changing
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Several new products are introduced, including SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes for excessive sweating, Built's Puff Protein Bars, Medicube's Zero Pore Pads for skin exfoliation, PanOxyl Antimicrobial Hydrating Acne Creamy Wash for sensitive skin, Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop, and Rael "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches. These items address various consumer needs from personal care to home cleaning.

articles.title: Amazon is selling ‘retro-style' $37 sneakers for only $17, and shoppers love their ‘sleek design'
articles.author: Jon Winkler
articles.summary: Amazon is selling Project Cloud Irita Sneakers. These sneakers feature a fresh look and low prices. The product is offered as a replacement for worn-out shoes.

articles.title: Virgin Media O2 announces launch of B2B telecoms provider O2 Daisy
articles.summary: Virgin Media O2 launched O2 Daisy, a new B2B telecoms company created by merging Virgin Media O2 Business and Daisy Group. O2 Daisy claims to be the second-largest SMB solutions provider in the UK, offering digital connectivity and managed services.

articles.title: OpenAI Teases New Models And Products Amid GPT-5 Anticipation
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: OpenAI is preparing to launch a range of new products and models, potentially including GPT-5, its next-generation AI. CEO Sam Altman has hinted at the upcoming releases, suggesting they will include new features and smaller variants alongside a flagship model. The launch date is speculated to be sometime in the coming months.

articles.title: Lidl's copycat beauty buy is selling for £25 less than John Lewis' version & shoppers are calling it an ‘amazing dupe'
articles.author: Shannon Power
articles.summary: Lidl launched a discounted dupe of Aesop aromatic hand wash, available for £2.09 to Lidl Plus App users until July 16. The hand wash comes in Reverence and Resurrection scents, offering a budget-friendly alternative to the original Aesop soap.

articles.title: There's a new amusement park, Chinese tea chain to try in North Jersey
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: HeyTea, a Chinese tea chain, opened a location in American Dream on July 18, offering various tea flavors, including cheese teas and fruit teas. Club Studio, a boutique fitness studio, had its grand opening in Edgewater on July 26, providing workout classes and personal training. Urban Air Adventure Park, an indoor amusement park featuring climbing walls and laser tag, opened in Parsippany on August 2.

articles.title: fb上的AI game
articles.summary: The AI product is being compared to an image, possibly in terms of aesthetics or functionality.

articles.title: Open for Business: Samsung Electronics Singapore Unveils  Business Experience Studio
articles.author: Vietnam News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Singapore has unveiled its Business Experience Studio. This studio is designed to help customers envision how Samsung's cutting-edge technology can address their digitization needs. The studio demonstrates Samsung's innovative and open approach to facilitating meaningful collaboration and delivering impactful business outcomes.

articles.title: STAKE Soft Unveils Groundbreaking AI-Powered Mirror Link Generator to Fortify Websites Against 2025's Evolving Cyber Threats
articles.summary: STAKE Soft launched its AI-powered mirror link generator, an advanced cybersecurity solution designed to protect against cyber threats. The platform enables businesses to rapidly create secure, encrypted mirror links, enhancing website resilience and ensuring continuous online presence. The AI-assisted links are encrypted and intelligently configured for performance and privacy.

articles.title: Homegrown Business: Charlotte Langley of Nice Cans
articles.author: Emilea Semancik
articles.summary: Nice Cans, a brand founded by Chef Charlotte Langley, offers premium, chef-crafted, and sustainably sourced tinned seafood with bold flavors. The brand aims to redefine the canned food category and make it a satisfying experience while addressing sustainability in seafood sourcing.

articles.title: Top Compact Powders to Shop – Amazon Great Freedom Festival Starts 31st July 2025
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Swiss Beauty introduced the All Matte & Set Duo Compact Powder, offering a matte finish and long-wearing appearance. Insight launched the HD Finishing Loose Powder for a soft-focus, airbrushed effect. Blue Heaven offers the Get Bright Compact Powder with SPF for sun protection, and Renee released the Everyday Compact Powder for smooth coverage and shine reduction.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord CE 5 Review: Delivers exactly what it promises without being too flashy
articles.author: Haider Ali Khan
articles.summary: OnePlus launched the OnePlus Nord CE 5, a mid-range smartphone priced at ₹24,999. The phone features a 6.77-inch FHD+ Super Fluid AMOLED display with a 120 Hz refresh rate, a 50 MP Sony LYT-600 main camera sensor, and a 7,100 mAh battery with 80W SUPERVOOC charging.

articles.title: Open for Business: Samsung Electronics Singapore Unveils Business Experience Studio
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Singapore has launched its new Business Experience Studio, a space designed to showcase Samsung's built-for-business solutions, including its professional display range, enterprise-ready Galaxy devices, Samsung Knox, Samsung VXT and SmartThings Pro. The studio aims to demonstrate and inspire customers on how they can deploy purposeful solutions from Samsung within their organizations.

articles.title: Open for Business: Samsung Electronics Singapore Unveils Business Experience Studio
articles.author: Media Outreach
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Singapore has launched its Business Experience Studio, a 2,150 square feet space. The studio allows businesses to envision how Samsung's innovative technology solutions can address their digitalisation needs.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics launches new task force on AI-focused projects
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. launched a new companywide [initiative].

articles.title: Fostering Innovation: How Leaders Can Build Adaptable Teams
articles.summary: BuildOps enabled their product teams to build a lead-generation tool in response to customer needs.  This was made possible by the company's culture of empowering teams to make independent decisions and innovate without unnecessary approvals. This digital innovation was part of their company mission.

articles.title: Grok Imagine Now Released to All SuperGrok and Premium+ Subscribers, Allows Users To Generate Videos From Still Images via Text Prompt
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: xAI has launched the Grok Imagine feature for SuperGrok and Premium+ subscribers. This new mode enables users to generate images and videos from text prompts or pictures within the Grok app version 1.1.33, functioning as an AI-powered Vine for creating short videos for social media.

articles.title: How to Sound Like an Influencer with CapCut's AI Narrator
articles.summary: CapCut introduced its AI Voice Generator and Text to Speech feature, which allows users to convert text into high-quality voiceovers in various tones and languages. This feature aims to help content creators, marketers, and educators enhance their videos by providing professional-sounding narration without the need for specialized equipment or voice coaching. The AI narrator offers benefits such as instant voiceovers, polished delivery, and scalability for creating content.

articles.title: Khairul Aming unveils fiery third product, ‘Rendang Nyet Berapi', after months of anticipation
articles.author: Malay Mail
articles.summary: Entrepreneur and influencer Khairul Aming has launched his third product, Rendang Nyet Berapi. 70,000 units will be released this Friday (August 8) at 9pm, live on his TikTok channel. Rendang Nyet Berapi follows his previous products, Sambal Nyet Berapi and Dendeng Nyet Berapi.

articles.title: BSNL Offers New Subscribers One Month Prepaid Plan For Just Rs. 1: What Are The Other Benefits?
articles.author: Rahul M
articles.summary: BSNL has launched a new prepaid plan called 'Azadi Ka Plan' for new customers. This plan is priced at ₹1 and includes 2GB of high-speed 4G data per day, unlimited voice calls, 100 SMS messages per day, and a free SIM card with 30 days validity. BSNL has also introduced doorstep delivery of SIM cards in India, allowing users to port existing numbers or activate new connections from home.

articles.title: I Use This Free App to Boost My Laptop's Sound Quality
articles.author: Aman Kumar
articles.summary: FxSound, formerly known as DFX Audio Enhancer, is a free, open-source application for Windows designed to improve device sound quality. The app offers a variety of presets for different scenarios and allows users to import additional sound configurations. The developers have recently made FxSound completely free for users, after being a paid service for over a decade.

articles.title: Organic Soap Market to Witness Substantial Growth by 2030 Driven by Rising Consumer Preference for Natural and Eco-Friendly Products
articles.summary: L'Occitane En Provence launched a project to increase Shea butter production capacity.  The global organic soap market is witnessing robust growth. This growth is driven by a convergence of factors, including increasing health consciousness, environmental concerns, and sustainability goals.

articles.title: Tesla Should Be Nervous: Li Auto's New SUV Is Faster, Sleeker, and Way Cheaper
articles.author: Eric Collins
articles.summary: Li Auto has launched its new electric SUV, the i8, with a starting price of approximately $44,691 USD. The i8 features impressive battery options, offering a driving range of up to 720 km and ultra-fast charging capabilities. It comes standard with the Li AD Pro assisted driving system, and higher-spec versions are equipped with the more advanced Li AD Max system.

articles.title: Nykaa spends ₹995 cr on marketing blitz in FY2025, Fuses AI and influencers to redefine retail
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Nykaa is expanding its reach with initiatives like 'Nykaa Now' rapid delivery, initially in Tier 1 cities with plans for Tier 2 expansion. Nykaa also strengthened its B2B Superstore, aimed at supplying small retailers in Tier 3 towns, serving over 2.76 lakh retailers.

articles.title: 35 Treats So Cheap And Fun You'll Get A Little Thrill
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Eos introduced a limited edition 'Nilla Milkshake Flavor Lab lip balm set. Vlasic launched Pickle Balls, a flavored puff. Kuumba Made released a Creamy Coconut fragrance rollerball.

articles.title: 余承东宣布尊界S800上市67天大定破10000台，该车型为华为系最贵豪车_手机网易网
articles.author: 鲁中晨报
articles.summary: Huawei's executive, Yu Chengdong, announced that the 尊界 S800 has achieved over 10,000 pre-orders in 67 days since its launch. The 尊界 S800 features innovative smart electric doors with obstacle detection and adjustable opening angles, along with a smart welcome light carpet and multiple color options.

articles.title: Google's AI-Powered Search Ad Preview for Advertisers
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google Ads is introducing an AI-powered search ad preview tool, which enables advertisers to visualize and optimize their campaigns by simulating how Google's AI interprets their ads across various search queries. The tool offers intent-based simulations, dynamic headline and description testing, expanded visualizations, and a mobile-first focus, leading to improved ad relevance, enhanced CTR prediction, and reduced wasted spend for advertisers.

articles.title: COMPETITION: New Orleans Saints' Spencer Rattler EMERGES as Frontrunner in Quarterback Battle
articles.summary: WeAreIowa launched the WeAreIowa app, a service that allows users to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones.

articles.title: Metaphors are forever
articles.author: S Ramesh Kumar
articles.summary: Brooke Bond Taj Mahal tea was launched in 1966 targeting the elite segment and was later repositioned to appeal to a broader audience. In 2025, Taj Mahal relaunched itself with the 'Chai Bansuri' campaign, reinforcing the metaphorical association between the tradition of music and tea and repositioning Taj Mahal as the embodiment of perfect blend of India's finest tea and soulful classical music.

articles.title: Jennifer Aniston accidentally reveals surprise personal details as she shares glimpse inside her handbag
articles.author: Faye James
articles.summary: Jennifer Aniston launched LolaVie's new dry shampoo and promoted it via Instagram. The dry shampoo is the latest addition to LolaVie's range of clean beauty products, which began with scalp and hair-treatment options and is now expanding into a full suite of salon-inspired options.

articles.title: IIJmioで「arrows Alpha」プレゼント、14日まで
articles.summary: Internet Initiative Japan (IIJ) offers the MVNO service "IIJmio". The service involves an Android device manufactured by FCNT.

articles.title: Lisa Snowdon loves this hair serum that's 'must have for hair loss' now 20% off
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Lookfantastic has launched a 20% off promotion on Nioxin's Anti-Hair Loss Serum, designed to minimize breakage and hair fall. The leave-in serum contains ingredients like caffeine, lauric acid, and niacinamide and claims to deliver stronger, thicker hair, with clinical studies showing improved hair anchorage. User reviews suggest positive results, with some experiencing increased thickness and regrowth.

articles.title: MG 7 spied: Chinese brand wants to show mid-size cars can still be cool
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: MG will launch a new car in Australia in October 2025. This new MG car is designed to compete with the Toyota Camry and Hyundai Sonata.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE Review: A Solid Mid-Range Tablet Choice
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Tab S10 FE tablet, targeting a balance of premium features and affordability with a focus on durability and long-term software support. The Tab S10 FE boasts an all-metal design with IP68 water and dust resistance, includes an S Pen, and is powered by either a Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 or Exynos 1380 processor. It arrives with the promise of four years of OS updates and five years of security updates.

articles.title: How Emotive brought Ultimate's luxury proposition to life using AI
articles.author: Lauren Mcnamara
articles.summary: Emotive agency's new AI unit enabled the creation of a large-format OOH campaign for Ultimate yoghurt brand, featuring renaissance-style visuals. The AI tools upscaled images and enhanced creative possibilities, to deliver unique visuals for the OOH campaign for the Ultimate yoghurt brand, showcasing a modern approach to outdoor advertising.

articles.title: Persona 5: The Phantom X is the Ultimate Character Design Permission Slip for Persona 6
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Atlus is hinting at changes with Persona 6. The company has "Persona 5: The Phantom X" in development.

articles.title: Samsung brings back the OG foldable with the sleeker Galaxy Z Fold 7
articles.author: Ashwin Rajagopalan
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, a foldable smartphone with an improved design that is thinner and lighter than its predecessor. It features an 8-inch Dynamic LTPO AMOLED 2X display, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and a 200MP primary lens for the rear camera. The device is priced starting from Rs 1,74,999.

articles.title: 31 TikTok-Approved Products
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: Nyx introduced Lip IV Hydrating Gloss Serum, a pigmented gloss that doubles as a long-lasting lip stain. Old Navy launched the Vintage tee, a versatile and comfortable t-shirt. Fisher-Price released a DJ table for toddlers with piano keys, lights, and sounds to encourage musical creativity. Oxo launched Cold Brew Rapid Brewer capable of making concentrated coffee in minutes.

articles.title: KFC Australia announces surprise new menu item NOBODY saw coming
articles.author: SHANIA OBRIEN
articles.summary: KFC Australia has launched the Zinger Kebab, a limited-edition menu item available nationwide from August 5th to September 8th. The Zinger Kebab combines the signature spicy Zinger fillet with fresh, Middle Eastern-inspired ingredients, including tabouli and creamy garlic sauce, and is available for purchase individually, as part of a combo, or through the KFC App.

articles.title: 32 Products With Impressive Before And After Pics
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new or noteworthy cleaning and beauty products ranging from Hard as Hoof nourishing cream and mold and mildew stain remover to Maybelline's Dark Circles Treatment Concealer and a L'Oréal repairing hair treatment. It also features products like an Essence lengthening mascara and oil-absorbing sheets, providing consumers with options to address specific beauty and household needs. The compilation emphasizes the benefits and unique selling points of each product, such as the speed of repair, ease of use, or affordability.

articles.title: Samsung TV to stream Jonas Brothers concert tour live
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics plans to offer [details of the offering are missing, but the statement implies a new product or service].

articles.title: OpenAI CEO teases launch of new AI models and products in coming months
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: OpenAI, led by CEO Sam Altman, is preparing to launch new AI models, products, and features in the coming months. This announcement suggests significant advancements and offerings from the company.

articles.title: Will AI help or wreck your summer vacation?
articles.author: Catherine Thorbecke
articles.summary: DeepSeek, ChatGPT and Manus are being used to create itineraries for travelers. These AI platforms offer a service that provides travel recommendations.

articles.title: How Bosch Power Tools Is Re-Inventing Service With AI Agents
articles.author: Tim Clark
articles.summary: Bosch Power Tools deployed agentic Gen AI within SAP Service Cloud, enabling AI agents to automatically classify cases and route them to the appropriate team. This system saves millions of work hours annually, reduces manual labor, optimizes service costs, and maintains consistent, high-quality customer experiences across regions which helps deliver new services. Adjustments that once took weeks now occur in minutes, providing scalability and flexibility.

articles.title: Novem celebrates the inauguration of the Proto-type Shop: a new benchmark for efficiency, transparency and customer orientation. (Novem Group SA)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Novem inaugurated a new Prototype Shop on August 4, 2025, designed to enhance efficiency, transparency, and customer orientation. The 4,000 m² facility aims to transform ideas into tangible prototypes.

articles.title: If these PlayStation 6 leaks are to be believed, Sony's next-gen system might not be ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Specifications for the upcoming PlayStation 6 have potentially leaked, offering an early glimpse into what consumers can expect from the future console.

articles.title: BoltPopper.com Rebrands with Bold New Look and Platform Focus, Signaling a New Era for Modern PR
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: BoltPopper rebrands its services with updated visuals and smarter PR tools. Jamie Clarke, Head of Corporate Change, states this signals a new chapter focused on bold ideas and clean communication, aiming to improve results for clients.
